mapper.insert: insert into mission (title, context, miImg, catId, userIdx, createdAt) values (#{title},#{context},#{miImg}, #{catId},#{userIdx}, curdate())
mapper.update: update mission set success=#{success}, updatedAt=curdate() where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC limit #{row},8
SELECT m.title, m.createdAt, m.miImg, u.profileImg, u.nickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx where m.catId = 1 ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC limit #{row},8
select count(idx) from mission where catId=1
select createdAt, title, likecount from mission where userIdx=#{userIdx} and month(createdAt) = month(curdate()) order by createdAt
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN m.success = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) * 100), 0) AS successRate FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx WHERE u.idx = #{userIdx}
